title: General
fullText:
Leakage protective device protection shall be provided to all single-phase and multi-phase low-voltage socket-outlets specified in Clauses 2.4.3.2.2 and 2.4.3.2.3. RCDs used as LPDs shall not protect socket-outlets in different rooms, or socket-outlets in different patient areas.
NOTE: Socket-outlets are defined in AS/NZS 3000, which includes cord extension sockets.
